snippet.title: Anthem: Legion of Dawn Edition Trailer - IGN First
snippet.description:
Get a look at Anthem's Legion of Dawn Edition, including the exclusive armor pack. As a bonus, this trailer gives a bit of story background on the Legion of Dawn too!

This is an IGN timed exclusive.

Anthem Story Trailer - The Game Awards 2018
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwQsqFe7OUw

Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

------------------------------­----
Watch more on IGN here!
------------------------------­----

TRAILERS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hr1dfwy4n90&list=PLraFbwCoisJA6xInpo8WhMSrR3Y7CjatL&index=2
